author: radekkapka
content: I wonder how reliable that would be in Kurtosis. In Prysm we have a Beacon API evaluator in our end-to-end tests that compares results from many API calls between Prysm and Lighthouse, and it's very flaky at the moment. I can share details if you're interested, but the main issue is that results that should be deterministic sometimes aren't (all endpoints that we consider non-deterministic are only checked for a 200 response)

author: radekkapka
content: Having something like this would be extremely valuable but might be very hard to pull off, especially if we want to compare responses between all clients
